ValidationRule.description: Checks to ensure key fields are populated where the status of the LOA is information rerequested.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( MainLOAStatus__c, "Information rerequested" )
&&
( ISBLANK( Date_Additional_Information_Requested__c ) || ISBLANK( LOA_Financial_Account__r.Public_Provider_Name__c ) || ISBLANK( Date_Last_Chased__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure there is a value for date additional info rerequested, date last chased, and provider.
